Package featureSplit.utils

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Feature
    Represents a feature: feature name and its index in the dataset that contains features from all views (index of feature in the Instances object acquired by merging all the views in the unique feature set).
    FeatureGraph
    Graph representing the measures between the features in the dataset.
    FeatureSplit
    Represents a feature split: the set of views (feature subsets) of the original dataset that has a unique feature set
    SplitStatistic
    Object that aggregates the measures of cutting the dataset in multiple views.
    View
    Represents one view of the data - a subset of the complete feature set that describes the data
